overview: We needed to shake off the winter blues so we decided to throw a big party. We invited some really hot girls and we even found a Fan Pick whose dream it was to meet Billy. She brought along her husband, and they were stoked to spend the day watching beautiful women suck and fuck like crazy. I think that after Billy took on Jeanie and Envy, the Fan Picks needed to sneak away and blow off some steam. Especially after Envy stuffed Billy's enormous cock up her ass. While that was going on Samantha was losing a game of strip pool to Voodoo. She didn't mind though when he used his stick to drive it home in her pocket. Grab a and come join the party!
title: Shane's World 23: Keg Party
